column2: Allows the switching of a single RGO province of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, Timber, or Precious Goods into Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Timber. Causes a cool down of 25 years.
Non-Accepted Bureaucrats do nothing for the nation. This decision will convert them all to artisans
